<title level="1" pfs="">[Barking Stag](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2140)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 36

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 34

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 13">[Barking Stag](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2140)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 40</row>

**Perception** +28; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +24, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +27, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +26

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +8

**Dex** +5

**Con** +4

**Int** -4

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Foil the Hunt** When it isn't injured, a barking stag benefits from [Cover Tracks](/Actions.aspx?ID=65), regardless of its travel Speed.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 34 

**Fort** +21 

**Ref** +26 

**Will** +23 

</row>

**HP** 245

**Weaknesses**
arrow vulnerability

**Arrow Vulnerability** A barking stag takes 10 additional damage from [arrows](/Weapons.aspx?ID=83) (but not bolts or other ammunition).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 45 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
antler +16 ([Grapple](/Traits.aspx?ID=184)),
**Damage** 3d10+12 piercing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hoof +16,
**Damage** 3d8+12 bludgeoning

**Antler Toss** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The barking stag has a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) with its antler; **Effect** The barking stag tosses the grabbed creature 20 feet into the air and up to 15 feet away in a direction of its choice, dealing 3d10+12 piercing damage plus [falling damage](/Rules.aspx?ID=420) to the creature.

**[Trample](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=39)** <actions string="Three Actions" />  Medium or smaller, hoof, DC 30

</column>
name: Barking Stag
